name: UnofficialDCMetroStatus
0:
”Alexa, ask metro status about Clarendon”
”Alexa, ask metro status Anacostia trains”
”Alexa, ask metro status about Chinatown”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: metro status
des:
Get unofficial Washington DC Metro (WMATA) real-time train estimates! 

Ask Alexa to give you train arrival times at metro stations. Try things like 'ask metro status about Clarendon', or 'open metro status' and then 'Anacostia trains'

Currently in Beta.
